extracted_playbook.title: Determine Vulnerable VMware Horizon Components
extracted_playbook.description: Refer to VMware Security Advisory VMSA-2021-0028.13 and VMware Knowledge Base (KB) 87073 to identify which VMware Horizon components are vulnerable.

extracted_playbook.condition: Were updates or workarounds promptly applied following VMwareâ€™s release of updates for Log4Shell in December 2021?

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Updates to VMware Horizon and UAG Systems
extracted_playbook.description: Install updated builds to ensure affected VMware Horizon and UAG systems are updated to the latest version.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Network Perimeter Access Controls
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure network perimeter access controls are as restrictive as possible while installing updates.

extracted_playbook.title: Treat VMware Horizon Systems as Compromised
extracted_playbook.description: Follow pro-active incident response procedures prior to applying updates if updates or workarounds were not promptly applied.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Temporary Workarounds
extracted_playbook.description: Use vendor-provided temporary workarounds from KB87073 and KB87092 if upgrading is not immediately feasible. Implement using an account with administrative privileges.

extracted_playbook.title: Ensure Appropriate Backups
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure appropriate backups have been completed prior to implementing any temporary solution.

extracted_playbook.title: Verify Successful Implementation of Mitigations
extracted_playbook.description: Execute the vendor supplied script Horizon_Windows_Log4j_Mitigations.zip without parameters to ensure that no vulnerabilities remain.

extracted_playbook.title: Keep Software Up to Date
extracted_playbook.description: Keep all software up to date and prioritize patching known exploited vulnerabilities (KEVs).

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Internet-Facing Attack Surface
extracted_playbook.description: Host essential services on a segregated DMZ, ensure strict network perimeter access controls, and do not host internet-facing services non-essential to business operations.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Web Application Firewalls (WAFs)
extracted_playbook.description: Implement regularly updated WAFs in front of public-facing services to protect against web-based exploitation.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Best Practices for Identity and Access Management
extracted_playbook.description: Implement multifactor authentication (MFA), enforce use of strong passwords, and limit user access through the principle of least privilege.
